name: Recruiting Profile Builder
content: Create a standout profile that includes your academic info, athletic achievements, highlight videos, and personal story.

name: Target School Generator
content: Build a list of target colleges based on your sport, academics, and personal preferences to guide outreach and visits.

name: Coach Messaging & Follow-Up System
content: Learn when, why, and how to message coaches — and how to track responses and follow-ups.

name: Highlight Video & Content Strategy
content: Craft an attention-grabbing highlight video and create a content plan that gets shared.

name: Recruiting Timeline & Task Tracker
content: Follow a monthly roadmap of what to do, when — from outreach to official visits.

name: Mock Interview & Decision-Making Coach
content: Practice answering tough questions from coaches and learn how to assess program fit.

name: Offer Evaluation & Scholarship Assistant
content: Compare offers, understand scholarship breakdowns, and spot red flags in packages.

name: Eligibility Center & Academic Compliance Tracker
content: Track NCAA/NAIA eligibility steps, GPA requirements, and coursework compliance.

name: Parent & Guardian Support Assistant
content: Help families stay informed, involved, and proactive without stepping on toes.

name: Mental Performance & Confidence Coach
content: Strengthen your focus, build your confidence, and manage recruiting pressure like a pro.

name: Content Planner & Personal Branding Assistant
content: Build a personal brand, post consistently, and use content to attract attention.

name: Campus Visit & Interview Prep Kit
content: Know what to ask, how to act, and how to follow up after a campus visit or interview.

name: Final Season Focus Plan
content: Lock in for your final high school or JUCO season to maximize impact and visibility.

name: Post-Graduate & JUCO Recruiting Route
content: Explore post-grad prep schools or JUCOs as part of your long-term recruiting plan.

name: NIL Game Plan for High School Athletes
content: Understand Name, Image & Likeness rules and build your value early.

name: Transition to College Athlete Life
content: Prepare mentally, physically, and academically to succeed as a college freshman athlete.

name: Transfer Portal Strategy
content: Build a plan before entering the portal — know your reasons, timeline, and what coaches want.

name: Life Without a Scholarship (Walk-On Paths)
content: Discover how walk-ons earn spots, gain playing time, and prove themselves.

name: Retired Athlete Reset Plan
content: If you're done competing, learn how to channel your identity and strengths into new goals.

name: College-to-Pro Dream Prep Plan
content: Learn what it takes — physically, mentally, and logistically — to pursue pro sports after college.

name: Athlete Career Pivot Planner
content: Turn athletic skills into professional success — identify, plan, and pivot.

name: Athlete-Entrepreneur Startup Blueprint
content: Build a business, monetize your brand, or launch a service around your sport identity.

name: Athlete Legacy Builder
content: Define what you want to be remembered for and create lasting impact in your community.

name: Athlete Alumni Network Builder
content: Create a support group or mentorship network for younger athletes using your experience.

name: Athlete Speaker Series Toolkit
content: Host talks, workshops, or podcasts that inspire — and build your leadership brand.
